name: project-shipex
description: This document outlines the step-by-step process for contributing to the project by creating a new branch, making changes, and submitting a Pull Request (PR).

scripts.install: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.dev: npm run backend & npm run frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm start --prefix backend
